name: Basic Web Application
description: A web application with React frontend, Node.js backend API, Azure SQL Database for relational data, and Blob Storage for static assets and images. Uses App Service for hosting, Application Insights for monitoring, and Key Vault for secrets management.

name: Machine Learning Training and Inference
description: A machine learning pipeline with Azure Machine Learning for model training, Container Registry for model images, Event Hubs for data ingestion, Data Lake Storage for training data, Azure ML endpoints for model serving, API Management for inference API, Application Insights and Key Vault for monitoring and security.

name: IoT Data Analytics
description: An IoT solution that collects data from devices using IoT Hub, processes it with Azure Functions or Stream Analytics, stores in Cosmos DB for real-time queries and Data Lake for analytics, visualizes with Power BI, and monitors with Application Insights.

name: Microservices with AKS
description: A microservices architecture with container apps deployed to Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), API Management as API gateway, Service Bus for message queue, Redis Cache for caching, Azure SQL or Cosmos DB for data persistence, Container Registry for images, and Azure Monitor for observability.

name: Event-Driven Architecture
description: An event-driven system using Event Grid for event routing, Azure Functions for serverless processing, Service Bus for reliable messaging, Cosmos DB for event store, Logic Apps for workflow orchestration, and Application Insights for monitoring.

name: Enterprise Data Warehouse
description: A data warehouse solution with Data Factory for ETL pipelines, Data Lake Storage for raw data, Synapse Analytics for data warehousing, Power BI for visualization, and Azure Purview for data governance and cataloging.

name: Serverless Web Application
description: A serverless web application with Static Web Apps for frontend hosting, Azure Functions for backend API, Cosmos DB for NoSQL data, Blob Storage for files, CDN for content delivery, and API Management for API gateway.

name: Batch Processing Pipeline
description: A batch processing pipeline using Azure Batch for compute jobs, Blob Storage for input/output data, Data Factory for orchestration, Azure SQL for metadata, and Azure Monitor for job monitoring and alerting.

name: Scalable API Backend
description: A scalable API backend with App Service or Container Apps for hosting, API Management for gateway and rate limiting, Redis Cache for response caching, Azure SQL or Cosmos DB for data, Service Bus for async operations, and Application Insights for monitoring.

name: Real-time Analytics
description: A real-time analytics solution with Event Hubs for data ingestion, Stream Analytics for real-time processing, Cosmos DB for hot path storage, Data Lake for cold path storage, Power BI for real-time dashboards, and Azure Monitor for system monitoring.

name: Intelligent Search Application
description: An AI-powered search application using Cognitive Search for indexing and search, Blob Storage for documents, Cognitive Services for content enrichment (OCR, entity extraction), App Service for web frontend, and Application Insights for monitoring.

name: Conversational AI Chatbot
description: A chatbot solution using Bot Service for bot framework, Azure OpenAI or Cognitive Services for natural language processing, Cosmos DB for conversation history, App Service for web channel, and Application Insights for bot analytics.

name: Multiplayer Gaming Backend
description: A gaming backend with PlayFab or custom game servers on AKS for multiplayer sessions, SignalR Service for real-time player communication, Cosmos DB for player profiles and game state, Redis Cache for leaderboards and matchmaking, Blob Storage for game assets, CDN for asset delivery, and Azure Monitor for performance tracking.

name: Video Streaming Platform
description: A media streaming solution with Media Services for video encoding and streaming, CDN for content delivery, Blob Storage for video files, Cosmos DB for video metadata and user preferences, Cognitive Services for content moderation and video indexing, Azure Monitor for streaming analytics.

name: E-commerce Platform
description: An e-commerce platform with App Service or Container Apps for web frontend, API Management for API gateway, Cosmos DB for product catalog and shopping cart, Azure SQL for order management and inventory, Service Bus for order processing workflow, Redis Cache for session state, Blob Storage for product images, CDN for static content delivery, Payment Gateway integration, and Application Insights for monitoring.

name: CI/CD DevOps Pipeline
description: A complete DevOps solution with Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions for CI/CD pipelines, Container Registry for Docker images, AKS or App Service for deployment targets, Key Vault for secrets management, Azure Repos or GitHub for source control, Azure Artifacts for package management, Azure Test Plans for testing, and Azure Monitor for deployment monitoring.

name: Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery
description: A disaster recovery solution with Site Recovery for VM replication, Backup for automated backups, Azure SQL with geo-replication, Traffic Manager for failover routing, Blob Storage with geo-redundant storage, Recovery Services Vault for backup storage, and Azure Monitor for health monitoring.

name: Multi-tenant SaaS Application
description: A multi-tenant SaaS platform with App Service or AKS for hosting, Azure SQL or Cosmos DB with tenant isolation, Azure AD B2C for customer identity management, API Management for tenant-level API throttling, Redis Cache for tenant-specific caching, Blob Storage with tenant containers, Key Vault for per-tenant secrets, and Application Insights for tenant-level monitoring.

name: Healthcare Data Platform
description: A healthcare solution with Azure Health Data Services FHIR API for healthcare data storage, API Management for secure API access, Azure AD for authentication, Blob Storage for medical imaging, Cognitive Services for medical text analytics, Synapse Analytics for health analytics, and Azure Monitor with HIPAA compliance logging.

name: Blockchain Ledger Application
description: A blockchain solution using Azure Confidential Ledger or Blockchain Service for immutable ledger, Cosmos DB for off-chain data, Azure Functions for smart contract execution, API Management for API gateway, Blob Storage for documents, Event Grid for ledger notifications, and Azure Monitor for audit logging.
